item.title: Git Branch Strategy
item.description: In this post, we will go over Git Branching Strategy and Git Workflows, it will not focus on comparing Git Branching Models, nor explain one by one since that story has been told more than once, but you will be able to find the links and examples in this post. If you’re looking for a Git Tutorial, I recommend my previous post on it, Git Explained by DEV Community. Introduction Git has become the de facto standard for source control management.
